domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse This administration is pushing a pack of lies or they are the stupidest people to ever go near the White House.  I fear it is really both. We don't have 120,000 deaths from Covid-19 because you have done a great job.
